org.easybatch.jpa

Class JpaBatchReader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.core.reader.BatchReader
      • org.easybatch.core.reader.AbstractBatchReader
        • org.easybatch.jpa.JpaBatchReader<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of objects this reader will read.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordReader

    public class JpaBatchReader<T>
extends AbstractBatchReader
    Reads records in batches using the Java Persistence API.
